summary: A comprehensive test suite for the internationalization message extraction system, verifying core extraction logic, handling of plural forms, custom layouts, locale exclusions, ignored paths, JavaScript literals, .pot file retention, location comments, multiple locale inputs, missing settings, wrapping behavior, and symbolic link processing.
business_intent: Validate that the i18n extraction commands work correctly and robustly across various configurations and edge cases within a Django project, ensuring accurate translation string collection and proper handling of locale-specific and file system nuances.
